Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons

Class WeaponWithAlternative

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons.Weapon
      • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons.WeaponWithAlternative
  • public class WeaponWithAlternative
extends Weapon
    This class inherits from the basic weapon and adds an alternative attack that can be used instead of the basic one

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Attack alternativeAttack
      This property represents the alternative attack of the weapon, which can be used in place of the basic attack

        Determines whether the given activePlayer can execute any Attack in the current situation
